project_abstract.cdata: The principal objective of the Huangpu Port Project is to assist the Government in the effort to relieve congestion and increase the handling capacity in the ports subsector.  The project provides for infrastructure development in a key port in southeastern China, as well as technical assistance and training to strengthen the port's management and improve its operating capabilities and to address intermodal aspects of port operations.  To that end, the project includes:  (a) increasing the capacity of Huangpu port; (b) providing training for port personnel; and (c) providing technical assistance.

P003494.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>黄埔港项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目的主要目标是协助广东省政府努力缓解港口拥堵状况，增加港口吞吐能力。项目为中国东南地区主要港口黄埔港建设基础设施，向其提供技术援助和培训，旨在加强港口管理，提高港口运营能力，处理港口多式联运问题。为此，项目安排了以下内容：（1）增加黄埔港吞吐能力；（2）向港口人员提供培训；（3）提供技术援助。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
